AboutComponents.title: We bring health to people!

AboutComponents.main_description: Alkimyogar Farm Company specializes in the production of high-quality colloidal minerals and medicinal extracts made from healing plants based on Canadian nanotechnology. The extracts are produced using the hydrolate method, making the company the first in CIS countries to introduce them for consumption! Founded in 2019, the company has developed more than 20 product varieties and gained over 5000 satisfied customers in a short time. The company aims to contribute to the nation's health by producing high-quality, natural, and affordable products.
AboutComponents.number_title: Collaboration with foreign and local research centers!
